name: Shared Notes
description: Shared Notes is a website that allows users to create and share notes with other users.

name: Leikkai
description: Mail subscription service for my friend's incoming clothing brand Leikkai.

name: Catchmaster
description: Catchmaster is a group project made for web development course 2 in Metropolia UAS. It is a fishing app where users can share experiences from their fishing trips.

name: Jobel
description: Jobel is a group project made for web development course 1 in Metropolia UAS. It is a place where you can share your thoughts anonymously!

name: Expense Tracker
description: Expense Tracker is a group project made in Metropolia UAS. It helps you keep track of your expenses!

name: Dots
description: Dots is a straightforward application that explores the use of React.

name: Ski resort simulator
description: Ski resort simulator is a group project made in Metropolia UAS. It stimulates the events that happen in a ski resort.

name: Animated Landscape
description: This project is a CSS animation of a landscape scene. Optimized for a screen resolution of 1920x1080 pixels for the best visual experience. Please note that using other resolutions may result in a less-than-ideal appearance :D.

name: Ylös-Ulos-Helsinki
description: Ylös-Ulos-Helsinki is a website made for a group project in Metropolia UAS. It is a website that helps you find activities in Helsinki.
